attributes.action: Make the Netflix show "Sex Education" an Age-15 certificate for teen access
attributes.additional_details: The popular Netflix show "Sex Education" tackles a number of sex subjects that need to be more accessible to the younger audiences. The show makes a very accepting, educational, and friendly view on topics that are actually very difficult in life; such as LGBTQIA+ acceptance; Safe and consensual sex; The dangers of sexual experimentation; Sexual Assault; Mental Health; Speaking about relationships. It reflects real world topics, and is not riddled with profane drug use or violence.
attributes.background: The Netflix show is certificate 18 through its 3 seasons, and without redefining all cinema and television certification, this show can be an exemption and be a Certificate Age 15 (or 15A "parental viewing advised" ) for the benefit of teens who are legally allowed to have sex from the Age of 16

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Age ratings for content hosted on streaming services such as Netflix are a matter for those services and the British Board of Film Classification (BBFC).
